name: A and J Mobile Detailing Reviews

review.title: “Will take your tips”
review.pros: Pros – Learn how to detail cars. I cant think of anything else good about this company.
review.cons: Cons – Will take your tips and wont pay you what he says he will pay you. Be careful and write everthing down if you have to work there.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Treat your employees right. If you cant pay proper then do it yourself.
